content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The Annual General Meeting of Aqualis ASA will be held in Oslo in June 2019

Date: 11th June 2019
Time: 08:00 CET
Venue: Advokatfirmaet Haavind AS at Bygdøy allé 2, 0257 Oslo[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Log in to the meeting” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”primary” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-user-circle” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Finvestor.vps.no%2Fgm%2FlogOn.htm%3Ftoken%3D1c6722f91c94e1dcf68b349fb9c3bd05a1c09e07%26validTo%3D1562824800000%26oppdragsId%3D20190520VPJBXAU0||target:%20_blank|”][vc_column_text]

Related documents

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Notice of Annual General Meeting 2019″ style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”primary” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-file-text-o” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F05%2FNotice-of-Annual-General-Meeting-2019.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”Proposal from the Nomination Committee” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”primary” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-file-text-o” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F05%2FProposal-from-the-Nomination-Committee_AGM-2019.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”Enclosure 2 – Statement capital increase” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”primary” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-paperclip” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F05%2FEnclosure-2-Statement-capital-increase.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][vc_btn title=”Enclosure 3 – Warrant Terms and Conditions” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”primary” align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-paperclip” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Faqualisbraemar.com%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2019%2F05%2FEnclosure-3-Warrant-Terms-and-Conditions.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: The annual general meeting of Aqualis ASA will be held on 11 June 2019 at 08:00 CET at the offices of Advokatfirmaet Haavind AS atBygdøy allé 2, 0257 Oslo.
